feffects.TweenObject

type
class
defined in
feffects.Tween
available in
swf
Class that allows tweening properties of an object.
Version 3.0.0 Compatible haxe 3 - flash/js/NME Usage :
import feffects.easing.Elastic;
using feffects.Tween.TweenObject; ...
var mySprite = new Sprite(); mySprite.graphics.beginFill( 0 ); mySprite.graphics.drawCircle( 0, 0, 20 ); mySprite.graphics.endFill(); Lib.current.addChild( mySprite ); function foo() { trace( "end" ); } mySprite.tween( { x : 100, y : 200 }, 1000 ).onFinish( foo ).start(); OR mySprite.tween( { x : 100, y : 200 }, 1000, foo, true );

Static Methods

tween(target : Dynamic, properties : Dynamic, duration : Int, ?easing : Easing, ?autoStart : Bool, ?onFinish : Void -> Void) : TweenObject

Constructor

new(target : Dynamic, properties : Dynamic, duration : Int, ?easing : Easing, ?autoStart : Bool, ?onFinish : Void -> Void)

Instance Variables

duration(default,null) : Int

easing(default,null) : Easing

isPlaying(accessor,null) : Bool

properties(default,null) : Dynamic

target(default,null) : Dynamic

tweens(default,null) : haxe.ds.GenericStack_feffects_TweenProperty

Instance Methods

onFinish(f : Void -> Void) : TweenObject

pause() : Void

resume() : Void

reverse() : Void

seek(n : Int) : TweenObject
